user.title: Energy Optimizer Setup
user.description:
Welcome to Energy Optimizer! This integration coordinates battery charging and energy optimization based on electricity prices, battery state, and PV forecasts.

**Recommended Integrations** (install from HACS if needed):
- **ha-rce-pse**: RCE electricity pricing and price windows
- **ha-solarman**: Inverter and battery control
- **Solcast Solar**: PV production forecasting (optional)

You can use other integrations with compatible entity structures.

price_entities.title: Price Entity Configuration
price_entities.description: Select entities that provide electricity price data

data_description.average_price_sensor: Sensor providing average price for comparison
data_description.cheapest_window_sensor: Binary sensor indicating cheapest price window
data_description.expensive_window_sensor: Binary sensor indicating expensive price window

battery_sensors.title: Battery Sensor Configuration
battery_sensors.description: Select entities that monitor battery state

data_description.battery_soc_sensor: Sensor showing battery state of charge (%)

battery_params.title: Battery Parameters
battery_params.description: Configure battery specifications and operating limits

data_description.min_soc: Minimum SOC to preserve battery health
data_description.max_soc: Maximum SOC (may be limited by inverter)

control_entities.title: Control Entity Configuration
control_entities.description: Select entities for controlling battery/inverter behavior

data_description.target_soc_entity: Entity to set battery charge target (required)
data_description.work_mode_entity: Entity to switch inverter work modes
data_description.charge_current_entity: Entity to control charge current limit
data_description.discharge_current_entity: Entity to control discharge current limit

pv_load_config.title: PV Forecast & Load Configuration
pv_load_config.description: Select sensors for PV forecasting and load monitoring (all optional)

heat_pump.title: Heat Pump Configuration
heat_pump.description: Configure heat pump monitoring and estimation (optional)

data_description.heat_pump_power_sensor: Sensor measuring heat pump power consumption

review.title: Review Configuration
review.description: Review your configuration before completing setup. Click Submit to create the integration.

error.entity_not_found: Entity not found. Please check the entity ID.
error.not_binary_sensor: Entity must be a binary sensor.
error.not_number_entity: Entity must be a number entity.
error.min_greater_than_max: Minimum SOC must be less than maximum SOC.
